strings: There's nothing I can do with it when I'm like this.

Brynn:  Beware. Malcolm has broken free, and certainly will seek me first. You must guide Brandon. Direct him toward the Amulet. Perhaps the lavender rose could key the spells.                            -Kallak  P.S. Solicit aid from Darm and Zanthia in building the amulet's powers.
Hmm?  Blank, except it has Brynn's name on it!
I'd better go to the temple.
Brynn will know what to do!
Smells like a rose to me.
Yum!  A small snack is nice.
Hey, one of the jewels on my amulet is blue now!
This potion should help me get in there.
I caught this teardrop at the Pool of Sorrow.
I caught this teardrop by this pool.
A nice addition to my marble colection.
Delicious!  I hope they aren't poisonous.
That last note shattered the ice!
I didn't think my playing was THAT bad.
I made the flames go out!
I guess I'll give it a shot...
This scroll is starting to pay off!
Hmm.  Nothing happened, but I feel like going somewhere else.
I thought this was a dead starfish.
A garnet this big must be very valuable.
It's shaped like a perfect triangle.
This diamond glitters in the sunlight.
This emerald is my favorite color.
This pearl must have come from the sea.
It was dangerous getting this ruby.
Hmm,  isn't this Di Magno Ferro, Sil Quad Oxylate?
What a curious combination of colors.
Looks like a huge cough drop.
This is the darkest gem I have ever seen.
This stone is warm to the touch.
This jewel glows with its own inner-light.
This rare gem has a tiny rainbow inside it.
Oh look, it's got half a worm in it.
This rose tingles in my hand.
I wonder what a floornut tastes like?
Could this be carved from emerald?
What am I thinking?  It's empty!
This is way too big for my head!
This probably isn't to the restroom!
Pretty tasty! I was getting hungry.
No more meat left on this.
It feels like I'm completely weightless.
Why do I have to do everything?
I wish I had a horse to ride.
I can't believe they let this happen!
Too bad I can't take a quick nap!
I think I'm getting a rash!
You'd think somebody would have a map of this place!
It seems like these caverns go on forever.
Eeeu!  I got pitch all over my vest!
How am I supposed to know what to do!?
I'm starving!  I never did get lunch!
Who would notice if I just went home?
I'd do anything for a pair of sandals!
I wonder how Grandfather is doing?
